title: Malice
description: Malice is the final book in the "Razor Saga" and wraps up the twisted tale of love that follows Lilah, a woman who seeks pleasure in the underground,to the end of her journey...or perhaps it is the beginning. This story is very graphic in nature, hardcore erotic in the BDSM world, and is sure to keep you wanting more. Adult only reading.MALVS 18+
author: Rue Volley
